description:
For those seeking a more natural feel and versatile look in their adventure-ready wardrobe, think Double Peak. Made from a lightweight ripstop fabric that’s tough and durable, it’s perfect for those who want something more laid back while still providing full functionality in the outdoors.

This pant is packed with performance details that will have you feeling like you can take on whatever the day (or week?) throws your way—we even boosted the pockets for extra security and convenience. And because we know you love the great outdoors; you'll be happy to hear it's made using comfy and sustainable organic cotton.
name: Prana Double Peak Pants, 32" Inseam - Mens
